abstract: Saxon Energy Services said it is in talks over a potential deal to be acquired by Houston oil field services giant Schlumberger and private equity investor First Reserve. The transaction for Saxon, a Canadian oil-well drilling company, would be worth about 592 million Canadian dollars ($519 million).
lead_paragraph: Saxon Energy Services said it is in talks over a potential deal to be acquired by Houston oil field services giant Schlumberger and private equity investor First Reserve. The transaction for Saxon, a Canadian oil-well drilling company, would be worth about 592 million Canadian dollars ($519 million).

headline.main: Schlumberger and First Reserve in Talks to Buy Saxon
